chapter.text: Out of options, you charge towards the monster, slamming your shoulder into its torso. ^1500It barely flinches. ^1500It grabs and lifts you up by the arm. ^1500You try to kick it, but it doesn’t react. ^1500Tears build in your eyes as you fight. ^1500The monster raises you up higher, then swings you down, slamming your body into the cold tile of the hallway. ^1500You feel a pain you’ve never felt before. ^1500Your vision goes dark.
